DOC.brief_summary: This study seek understand physical , physiologic biologic feature predispose woman development obstructive sleep apnea expose cardiopulmonary metabolic physiological change pregnancy . Knowing specific predictive factor help identify population risk guide clinician develop suitable target screen strategy .
DOC.brief_title: Predictors De-novo Development Obstructive Sleep Apnea Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients recruit multiple community hospital-based practice care pregnant woman . Subjects : 1. measurement body composition 2. anthropometric measure 3. sleep mood questionnaire 4 . Home sleep study 5. blood test biological marker 6. salivary test hormonal marker 7. pulmonary function test upper airway patency measurement Women without sleep apnea enrollment follow longitudinally development obstructive sleep apnea pregnancy repeat assessment third trimester . Women diagnose sleep apnea enrollment assessment late pregnancy . Monetary incentive also issue data collection point . Subjects receive small gift incentive baby-related item .
DOC.criteria: < 13 complete week gestation BMI > 30 kg/m2 recruitment > 18 year age Ability give inform consent Unable meet inclusion criterion Twin pregnancy
